pages.text: Now you have yourself a chopping blade, and you can attack trees with it. But what can you achieve with some logs? Right, you want some planks. To turn your logs into planks, make a chopping block. How do you make that, you ask? FINE, I'll tell you: Grab a rock from the ground, then press down shift and right click on a wood log with your rock. Tada, now you have not one but two chopping blocks.
pages.title: Woods everywhere

pages.text: To get your wood planks, right click the chopping block with wood logs in your hand, and then grab your chopping blade and start chopping with left click until it turns into planks. There are other things you can make with this method: You can turn planks into sticks; grass into plant fiber.
pages.title: The Chopping Block
